item.title: This Week in Virtualization
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: I was invited by Nick Martin and Tom Walat to join them in this pre-VMworld edition of the podcast, so if you’re not bored reading about my Marvin speculations already, you can now listen to them as well over at This Week in Virtualizationby SearchServerVirtualization. It also covers some expectation for VMworld 2014, which is rapidly getting closer.
